channel.title: [pi] combat help will rep++
channel.description:
My server combat is little messed up also i added ovl and other item whu give huge amout of str + and now iwant to stop specific weapon from hitting like 60 anyone have any idea how to do what lets say to stop godswords hit more then 55 without spec it will very help my i think code should start with c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == ITEMID
Sorry can give any information cuz dont need... ijust want to stop my weapons from big damage so it would be perfect THNX
